entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
